text: "Places" is a song recorded, written, and produced by Greek DJ Xenia Ghali, featuring vocals by singer-songwriter Raquel Castro. The track became Ghali's second single to reach number one on the Billboard Dance Club Songs chart in its May 6, 2017 issue. ==Track listing== SingleSingle release from iTunes #"Places" (featuring Raquel Castro) [radio edit] – 3:07 RemixTrack listing from Amazon Music #"Places" (extended mix) – 4:31 Remixes Part 2Track listing from Amazon Music #"Places" (X.G. Remix) #"Places" (Belocca's Space Remix) #"Places" (Gamechasers Remix) #"Places" (Chunks Remix) #"Places" (Casey Alva Remix) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Official video at YouTube Category:2016 songs Category:2017 singles Category:Billboard Dance Club Songs number-one singles Category:Electronic songs Category:House music songs
title: Places (Xenia Ghali song)
